scripts.build:deploy: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp main.js ${OBSIDIAN}/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-time-entry-turner/ && cp manifest.json ${OBSIDIAN}/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-time-entry-turner/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
